message_1:
Using the Rail fence cipher with a rail depth of 3, encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS IS FUN" and write the ciphertext in rows like this: 

M . . . T . . . I . . . S . . . F . . .
. A . E . A . C . S . N . U . . . .
. . T . . . M . T . . . I . . . . O . 

What is the resulting ciphertext?
message_2:
The resulting ciphertext for the message "MATHEMATICS IS FUN" using the Rail fence cipher with a rail depth of 3 is:

MTISFAEACSNUTMTIO
